import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Col, Row, Image, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import useParams from 'react-router-dom' // import Product from '../products' const ProductDetails = ({ match }) => { let { params } = useParams(); const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { // getProduct() const fatchProduct = async () => { const { data } = await axios.get(`/products/${match.params.id}`) console.log(data) setProduct(data) }; fatchProduct() }, [match]) return ( <>

{product.name}

{` $ ${product.price}`}
{product.description}
 Status : {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Out of Stock"} ) } export default ProductDetails
